Articles.Content:
First my player.log:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/2ky95dobgse52mf/Player.log?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/2ky95dobgse52mf/Player.log?dl=0)

Reproduction:

Launch KSP. Then open the Spaceplane Hangar. Now add the newly added landing gears. 

For me it doesn't show the textures for the medium and large landing gear.

Actually the textures for the ore tanks are missing, too.

I checked the folders and noticed that every wheel and gear have the .dds files which are somehow missing for the landing gear.

Thank you for the help

DeepSlay

- - - Updated - - -

Also the textures for the drill, the fuel cell, IRSU and the scanners are missing, too.

- - - Updated - - -

Also my flags are missing.

I had the same problems.

I reinstalled the game and deleted the Active Texture Management mod.

Now it is working.

Chris

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T18:24:47Z" title="04/28/2015 06:24  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Chris1504**
